about_the_game:
You sailed to the Lost Isle to stake your claim of wealth and glory, but in a violent storm you were thrown overboard, and now you’ve washed ashore with nothing but a small knife and a single candle. You must carve out an existence in an unforgiving environment disguised as a paradise. You are not the only survivor, and everyone is after the same thing.

Lost Isle is a game of ingenuity and sheer will to survive. Each experience is what you make of it. Every day is a new chance to rise to the top, and every death is an opportunity for sweet revenge.

Inspired by other incredible survival games that we all know and love, Lost Isle takes the open-world survival craft genre and adds a medieval fantasy twist that is sure to feel like a fresh and unique experience.

*This demo features a significantly smaller map with a reduced number of landmarks, and lower total player count per server compared to the full version of the game.

content_descriptors.notes: PvP and PvE violence and blood. Online text and voice chat.

You must carve out an existence in an unforgiving environment disguised as a paradise. You are not the only survivor, and everyone is after the same thing.

Inspired by other incredible survival games that we all know and love, Lost Isle takes the open-world survival craft genre and adds a medieval fantasy twist that is sure to feel like a fresh and unique experience.

name: Lost Isle Demo

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10 64bit
  • Processor: Intel Core i7-3770 / AMD FX-9590 or better
  • Memory: 16 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GTX 1050 / AMD 500 Series or better
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 25 GB available space
  • VR Support: No
  • Additional Notes: SSD Highly Recommended
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 11 64bit
  • Processor: Intel Core i7-4790K / AMD Ryzen 5 1600 or better
  • Memory: 24 GB RAM
  • Graphics: RTX 3060 / RX 570 Series or better
  • DirectX: Version 12
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 25 GB available space
  • VR Support: No
  • Additional Notes: SSD Highly Recommended

short_description: Explore a new take on open-world survival in a unique and procedural fantasy world. Build your own settlement and protect it from monstrous beasts and players alike. Craft weapons and equipment from a land bathed in cosmic power.
